item.title: NBA Cup takeaways: Everything to know before Friday's final night of group play
item.description: The 2025 NBA Cup continues as group play wraps up. Here's everything you need to know about the third annual in-season tournament.

item.title: Sources: Kelly officially fired by LSU without cause
item.description: The posturing over Brian Kelly's $54 million buyout from LSU is over, sources told ESPN, as the school sent him a letter Wednesday saying it is offici...

item.title: Sources: Jays, Cease reach 7-year, $210M deal
item.description: Right-hander Dylan Cease, who has made at least 32 starts in each of the past five seasons, reached a seven-year, $210 million deal with the Blue Jays...

item.title: Center Ragnow ends retirement to return to Lions
item.description: Frank Ragnow, a four-time Pro Bowler for the Lions, is ending his five-month retirement and returning to play for Detroit.

item.title: Faulk expected to land Southern job, sources say
item.description: Former NFL star and current Colorado RBs coach Marshall Faulk is expected to become head coach at Southern University, sources confirmed to ESPN.
